item.title: Docs: EncryptedArithTypes
item.description:
EncIntType

Encrypted integer type with arbitrary width

Syntax:

!enc_arith.enc_int<
unsigned # width
>

An encrypted integer with variable width.

Parameters:

Parameter C++ type Description
width unsigned

item.title: Docs: PolyAttributes
item.description:
PolynomialAttr

An attribute containing a single-variable polynomial.

#poly = #poly.poly<x**1024 + 1>

Parameters:

Parameter C++ type Description
value Polynomial

RingAttr

An attribute specifying a ring.

An attribute specifying a polynomial quotient ring with integer coefficients, $\mathbb{Z}/n\mathbb{Z}[x] / (p(x))$.

cmod is the coefficient modulus $n$, and ideal is the ring ideal $(p(x))$. Because all ideals in a single-variable polynomial ring are principal, the ideal is defined by a single polynomial.

#ring = #poly.ring<cmod=1234, ideal=#poly.polynomial<x**1024 + 1»

Parameters:

Parameter C++ type Description
cmod APInt
ideal Polynomial

item.title: Docs: PolyTypes
item.description:
PolynomialType

Polynomial represents an element of a polynomial quotient ring

Syntax: !poly.poly

A type for polynomials in a polynomial quotient ring.
